definition: oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning

sentences.english: It's okay to substitute  vegetable oil for butter.
sentences.chinese: 用植物油代替黄油也一样。

sentences.english: Traditionally, soap was a mix of animal fatsfruit or vegetable oils. This combination has a high PHis drying to skin, particularly to aging skin.
sentences.chinese: 传统上，香皂是动物脂肪和水果油或植物油的混合体。

sentences.english: She uses vegetable oil for frying fish.
Vegetable fats are healthier than animal fats.
sentences.chinese: 植物油比动物油更有益于健康。

sentences.english: Vegetable oil has been known from antiquity.
sentences.chinese: 植物油从古以来就为人们所熟悉。

sentences.english: So there's a clear commercial reason for using unsaturated vegetable fats.
sentences.chinese: 因此，有一个明确的使用不饱和植物油的商业理由。

sentences.english: Pour vegetable oil on the exhaust of someone’s car so it will smoke when started up.
sentences.chinese: 在别人车的排气管里倒入植物油，发动时会冒黑烟。

sentences.english: Take that cookie. Vegetable fats are cheaper and are used in place of butter.
sentences.chinese: 以曲奇为例子，植物油便宜，可用于代替黄油。

sentences.english: To obtain biodiesel, the vegetable oil is subjected to a chemical reaction termed transesterification.
sentences.chinese: 植物油可通过化学反应酯交换反应得到生物柴油。

sentences.english: The present invention relates to a vegetable oil comprising a mixture of cereal oils and fruit oils.
sentences.chinese: 本发明涉及一种包含谷类油和果类油混合物的植物油。

sentences.english: Mullein oil can be used to treat ear infections.
sentences.chinese: 而该植物油可以用来治疗耳朵的感染。

sentences.english: This vegetable oil product is a by-product of the palm kernel oil industry.
sentences.chinese: 该植物油为棕榈仁油工业中的副产品。

sentences.english: Sodium bicarbonate sitz baths and topical vegetable oils may provide some local relief.
sentences.chinese: 碳酸氢钠坐浴和局部外涂植物油可缓解症状。

sentences.english: The temperature respond mechanisms of pure water and vegetable oils were mainly investigated during microwave irradiation in this parer.
sentences.chinese: 主要探讨了植物油与水的温度在微波场中的响应规律。

sentences.english: Rubber seed oil is one of the plant oils rich in polyunsaturated fats.
sentences.chinese: 橡胶种子油是富含多价不饱和脂肪酸的植物油之一。

sentences.english: We use vegetable oil for cooking.

definition: oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning
